entry.content:
I've seen it around a couple of times and so I wrote up my thoughts!! As an actual blogpost instead of just spamming the FTL!!

https://go.kibi.family/Aug/2018/girlfriends.xhtml

If you read the article, you might find it interesting. (If you didn't, there's a link at the top~)
